morning, a cargo ship crashed into a fishing boat called Gai
Doi, which sank at sea in an accident.  One
person died, two people are
missing in the waters of Qua Ngai, about five nautical miles from the
coast. Cao Ca Khuyen
11126 TS of Mr. Nguyen Dam, 46 years old, was
fishing for seafood when suddenly the
company's cargo ship shook his brakes.  On the way from
Ho Chi Minh City to Ha Tinh, there was a
collision that caused the fishing boat to sink. The crew
member fell into the sea. Upon receiving the news,
rescue forces and fishing vessels in the
area urgently rescued the crew member after
many hours.  Search Rescue forces
rescued seven people, one of
whom died due to severe injuries,
six injured people were brought ashore to
rescue two missing people, the
authorities and Cao Ca teams are present.  The
locality is looking for two missing crew members
and investigating the cause.
Last evening, the forces of Coast Guard Region
2 successfully rescued and brought seven
people. A Ngai fishing boat in distress returned to
shore after the ship crashed.  Their fish sank at
sea in the Quang Nam area.
Previously, at 3:30 p.m., the
Coast Guard Region 2 command received notice that the
ship on day 50730 TS, captained by Mr. Nguyen
Van Tri, sank due to
strong waves.  All seven crew members were clinging
to objects floating at sea. The
Coast Guard Region 2 command ordered two
speedboats to urgently search for seven
fishermen drifting at sea. By 5:30 p.m., the
Coast Guard had found seven  The victims were
put on a first aid boat and then brought back to shore and
handed over to the border guards of
Quang Ngai province and the local government of
Binh Hai commune. The health situation of the seven
people is
stable. Continue in the information section.

This morning Vietnam time the
US odysse landing ship  landed near the
south pole of the moon inter machine the
ship's owner became the first private company
in history to send a
lander to the
moon intuitive machines the odyssee landed
on the moon at 23:23 GMT  The
director of the US Aerospace Agency, Nasa,
sent congratulations and called this a
victory for the US. Nasa is the
main sponsor of the onboard experiments. They
had to pay intuitive machines 118
million US dollars to send  bringing the
latest experimental equipment to the
Moon on the eighth day of a journey
nearly 400,000 kilometers long. The odyssee has
landed on the Moon. This is a
new scientific journey. The odyssee will
continue to operate for another 7 days.  Before
darkness covers the southern polar region of the
moon, causing it to fall into a forest state, the
rover will focus on
gathering information about
space-weather interactions with the lunar surface for
radio astronomy work.  Landing technology and
precision navigation The success of
intuitive machines and the Odyssey also
marked America's return to the
moon after half a century of absence since the 1972
Apollo mission.
Yesterday, the European police agency
Europol said  We know that we have just coordinated with
forces in three countries: Germany, France, Belgium, to destroy
one of the largest networks of people smuggling people
across the strait.
19 evil German subjects have been
arrested, including the leader.
The suspects organized the purchase,
storage and transportation of inflatable B-boats
mainly originating from
China, which were then
used  to bring migrants from the beaches
near the French city of Khale to the
British Isles. On average, each boat with a
maximum capacity of 10 people had to
carry up to 50 people, earning between 1,000 and
3,000 Euros from each migrant force.
Authorities conducted a search in 28
locations in Germany, confiscating 24 inflatable boats,
a large amount of marine equipment, 60
electronic weapons devices and thousands of
Euros in cash. About 900 German police
participated in the operation.  Earlier this month the European
Union's frest border control agency
said
immigration to the bloc from West Africa increased more than tenfold
in January
this year for the first time in the
country's history.  raising the level of crisis
in health care services to the
highest severity level on a
four-level scale. This occurs in the context of
thousands of intern doctors quitting their jobs
to protest plans to increase enrollment targets.
Medical sector The Prime Minister said the government will increase the
operation of public health care facilities
to the maximum on
weekdays and expand
consulting services on weekends and holidays.
adding four regional units to
transport critically ill emergency patients. The
Korean Ministry of Health also announced that it will allow
full remote treatment at all
hospitals and clinics, with nearly 9,000
actual doctors now.  Immediately, nearly 80 minutes in total at
major hospitals have filed a resignation letter. The
Korean Medical Association plans a
large-scale protest in Seun on
February 25 and 3 months after the strike
began on February 20.  2 caused
major hospitals to cancel 30 to 50 minutes of
surgeries and refuse patients in need of
emergency care. Doctors and
medical students spoke out against the
Korean government's plan, saying that  The
country already has enough doctors and increasing the
quota of medical students is not
necessary. On the contrary, the government believes that it should
start training more new doctors to
solve the challenges posed
by the aging

2024, a Chinese artist created
a collection of egg carvings with
clear images of
2024 Hu Quang Sang is a
folk carving artist from Ha Bei province.
His set includes 10 eggs in
which he combined the image of a dragon with
the number 2024 stretched across four eggs
in the first egg carving art where
the artist chooses
eggshells of appropriate size and thickness.  The thickness of the
eggshell is very important, then the
artist uses a pen to sketch and then uses a
carving tool to make the
details. The commonly used eggshell is
chicken eggshell, ostrich egg,
egg basket carving is a type of painting.  Folk art
combining Hoa and carving has existed
since ancient times. The prices of these products are often
very high because of their sophistication.

conserve this animal species. The

according to eyewitnesses
Vu Viet, at about 9:00 a.m.  The young girl
rode a motorbike to stop in the middle of Phu Cuong bridge.
After a while of hesitation, the girl climbed over the

Before the scene unfolded, many people

Picked up the girl.  The victim was unconscious so he
was taken to the hospital for emergency treatment.
Vu Viet's cause is being investigated and
clarified. The police leaders of Thanh Hoa province and

units a total of 130 million VND.
Outstanding achievements in the fight to

in large quantities
Duc Nam, 33 years old, in

20 kg of drugs sent from abroad.  via
air to Thanh Hoa and some

in Hanoi city for

Police continue to arrest two more

1985, residing in Hanoi city. Huy  has

consumption. This
morning, the police of Thanh Khe district,
Da Nang city, said they had just destroyed a
gang.  A place specializing in buying and selling drugs through which the
authorities urgently arrested
36-year-old Ho Trong Binh and seized a volume of
Heroin worth tens of millions of
dong before Tet. Thanh Khe District Police
took stock of the situation and discovered that Binh had a lot of it.
Unfair manifestations of frequent contact
with Suspicious subjects. The
drug transaction location is located in a deep alley so it was
difficult to detect until the evening of February 21. The
scouts raided the Binh's residence at the alley
146 Nguyen Hoang Phuong Vinh.  Mid-Autumn Festival
confiscated 160 paper packages with white powder inside.
Binh confessed that it was heroin that had
just been taken and divided in preparation for
sale at the police station. Binh
admitted that he had contacted a young man whose
background was unknown.  The social network arranged to
meet at the central bus station of
Da Nang city to receive this amount of heroin with a
value of about 55 million VND. Currently, the case is
continuing to be investigated and clarified this morning,
three cars collided slowly across the country.  Highway
1A in Nghe An province caused two
casualties at about 6:30. A small car
traveling on Highway 1A in the direction of Vinh
Dien Chau when the car arrived at Nghi Quang commune,
Nghi Loc district, collided with a tractor-trailer with the
same vehicle.  At this time, an approaching passenger car,
unable to avoid it in time, crashed into the rear of the tractor-trailer,
causing a series of accidents between three
vehicles. After the collision, the car's head was crushed,
causing the driver to die on the spot and one
passenger in the vehicle.  He was seriously injured in an
accident that occurred during rush hour, causing
traffic on National Highway 1A
through Nghi Loc district to be temporarily congested for a
kilometer. Discussing the dangerous traffic situation
on the road  Special expressway
design related to the incident yesterday afternoon
occurred on Vinh Hao Phan Thiet expressway, the section
passing Hoang Thuan Bac expressway, Binh
Thuan province, heading from the central region. A
passenger car had a wheel burst and the driver had to
control the vehicle.  crawl slowly to the emergency stop
to handle the problem and change the tire.
However, the emergency stop was interrupted
during the process of changing the driver's two-legged vehicle,
sometimes encroaching on the main road,
causing many traffic vehicles to encounter obstacles.  The
Vinh Hao expressway is about 100
km long and has two villages. The village does not have an
emergency stop village, but only has an emergency stop every 4 to five kilometers.
Therefore, when an
incident occurs, the driver will face many difficulties.
In addition, at emergency stops,
there are also trucks pulling over to park to
rest in the area of ​​vehicles having
trouble on the

Following the updated information, ladies and gentlemen,
doctors and nurses at Long
Khanh Dong Nai regional general hospital recently successfully performed emergency surgery to
save Nam's life.  The patient had a myocardial infarction and
had a cardiac arrest during the 90-minute emergency.
The doctors directly involved in rescuing
the patient said that this was an
extremely rare emergency and could be called a
miracle. Previously, on January 27,  A hospital
admitted Mr. To Quy, 57 years old,
with chest pain. After measuring his
heart rate, the patient went into a violent panic attack. His
heart rate gradually decreased. The hospital progressed rapidly, causing
cardiac arrest and apnea. His blood pressure was all
zero. The patient  The hospital turned on the
red alert mode, mobilizing all doctors and nurses to focus on providing emergency
care to the patient for
nearly 1 and a half hours. The doctors placed a
breathing tube to perform external chest compression, 30 tubes of
cardiopulmonary probiotics, and electroshock.  Four times
until the 90th minute, the patient showed signs of a heartbeat
again. When you saw that the
patient had signs of new life, he
tried harder and then
the patient was given
other drugs.  Moreover, the heart rate also
increased more than before and the patient had a
pulse and a heartbeat. Hy Huy's pressure returned.
Afterwards, the patient's blood vessels
on the right side were revascularized, which had previously been completely turned off,
helping the blood vessels.  The patient's pressure
gradually stabilized. Mr. Quy's health is now
stable. He can live normally
and move lightly. He is scheduled for a follow-up examination after
a week. Doctors recommend when experiencing
symptoms such as chest pain and
high blood pressure.  need to go to the hospital immediately to
receive
timely medical assistance. This is the end of our 6-hour program today.
Thank you for your
interest. See you again in the
60-hour program tomorrow morning. Goodbye.
